DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate two dos tenofovir alafenamide versus tenofovir disoproxil fumarate ( tenofovir DF ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose Escalation Study Tenofovir Alafenamide Treatment-Naive Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria HIV1 RNA level great equal 30,000 copies/mL CD4 count great equal 200 cells/mm3 Serum creatinine < 1.5 mg/dl Hepatic transaminases less equal 2.5 time upper limit normal Total bilirubin less equal 1.5 mg/dL Adequate hematologic function Serum amylase less equal 1.5 time upper limit normal Serum phosphate great equal 2.2 mg/dL Not pregnant Exclusion Criteria Prior treatment antiretroviral therapy Immunization within 30 day study entry A new AIDS defining condition within 30 day study entry Receiving nephrotoxic agent , probenecid , chemotherapeutic agent , corticosteroid , interleukin2
